results.deck: Australian Rules Football sees it's second release on 360 & PS3
results.name: AFL Live 2

results.deck: A 2014 entry in the Project Diva series of rhythm games starring the popular vocaloid Hatsune Miku.
results.name: Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA F 2nd

results.deck: Ratchet and Clank's last hurrah on the PS3, Into the Nexus is a single-player shooter-platformer billed as an epilogue to 2009's A Crack in Time.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank: Into the Nexus

results.deck: The third major installment of the Street Fighter IV legacy adds characters and stages from Street Fighter X Tekken, a brand new fighter, new gameplay mechanics (including the ability to bring both Ultra Combos into the fight), and a variety of balance tweaks, training enhancements, and new modes.
results.name: Ultra Street Fighter IV

results.deck: F1 2013 is Codemasters' latest entry in the Formula 1 branded series of racing games.
results.name: F1 2013

results.deck: An Action Adventure game based on The LEGO Movie and developed in the style of other TT Games' LEGO videogames.
results.name: The LEGO Movie Videogame

results.deck: Strider Hiryu must assassinate Grandmaster Meio in this action-adventure game from Double Helix and Capcom.
results.name: Strider

results.deck: Graphic novel game from Mages & 5pb.
results.name: Disorder6

results.deck: Stop Plankton's robot army from getting the Krabby Patty secret formula
results.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Plankton's Robotic Revenge

results.deck: Japan-only game in the Super Robot Wars series
results.name: 2nd Super Robot Wars Original Generation

results.deck: Visual novel based on Peach-Pit's Rozen Maiden franchise.
results.name: Rozen Maiden: Wechseln Sie Welt ab

results.deck: Game based on the Infinite Stratos franchise, about the sole male student at a military academy where future pilots of the powerful IS suits are trained.
results.name: Infinite Stratos 2: Ignition Hearts

results.deck: A remake of Atelier Rorona, featuring updated gameplay and graphics more in line with the latter Arland games.
results.name: Atelier Rorona Plus: The Alchemist of Arland

results.deck: Console port of the visual novel White Album 2, containing both the Introductory and Closing chapters with the adult content removed.
results.name: White Album 2: Shiawase no Mukougawa

results.deck: Persona 4: Arena Ultimax is a sequel to the original Persona 4 Arena. It has new characters, new stages and several new gameplay related changes such as new moves.
results.name: Persona 4: Arena Ultimax

results.deck: The next game in the Yakuza franchise, centering on a character named Ryoma Sakamoto.
results.name: Ryu ga Gotoku Ishin!

results.deck: The standalone expansion pack for XCOM: Enemy Unknown adds cybernetic soldiers and aliens, along with new multi-player maps.
results.name: XCOM: Enemy Within

results.deck: The Xtreme Legends expansion for Dynasty Warriors 8 introduces three new player characters, Lu Bu's daughter Lu Lingqi, strategist Chen Gong, and Wu general Zhu Ran.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends

results.deck: Sequel to the PSP action-adventure game, where the player hunts down vampires and strips them of their clothing in the Tokyo district Akibahara.
results.name: Akiba's Trip: Undead & Undressed

results.deck: 3D fighting game featuring characters from the Super Robot Wars Original Generation franchise.
results.name: Super Robot Taisen OG Infinite Battle

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors: Gundam Reborn is a more realistic-looking Gundam Warriors game.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors: Gundam Reborn

results.deck: Romance adventure RPG from director of the Tokyo Majin Gakuen series.
results.name: Tokyo Twilight Ghost Hunters

results.deck: Compete for the title of "World's Best Driver" in this toy-themed arcade racer.
results.name: Hot Wheels World's Best Driver

results.deck: A new game in Tecmo's Deception series, where this time the player controls the Devil's daughter as she seeks to free her imprisoned father.
results.name: Deception IV: Blood Ties

results.deck: Strategy RPG for PlayStation Platforms.
results.name: Natural Doctrine

results.deck: The two legendary puzzle series unite in this crossover title.
results.name: Puyo Puyo Tetris

results.deck: An arcade flight simulation during the Vietnam War.
results.name: Air Conflicts: Vietnam

results.deck: Visual novel about a group of youths attempting to reconnect after witnessing two moons in the sky, reminding them of a similar event from their childhood.
results.name: '&': Sora no Mukou de Sakimasu you ni

results.deck: A prequel to the main Hakuoki game, it tells the story of a young man who falls in with the Rshigumi and is there for the founding of the Shinsengumi.
results.name: Hakuoki Reimeiroku

results.deck: Four critically-acclaimed PSN games on one disc for the PlayStation 3
results.name: Best of PlayStation Network Vol. 1

results.deck: The first in SystemSoft Alpha's series of strategy games inspired by three kingdoms era China.
results.name: Sangoku Hime: Ransei, Tenka Sanbun no Kei

results.deck: SystemSoft Alpha once again returns to the little known era of Japanese history where the battlefields were dominated by cute girls with brightly colored hair.
results.name: Sengoku Hime 4: Souhai Hyakkei, Hana Mamoru Chikai

results.deck: Travel to Africa to hunt the most ferocious beasts alive across 5 different biomes.
results.name: Cabela's African Adventures

results.deck: Second in the series of anime styled strategy games set in an alternate history where the Nazis won World War 2.
results.name: Shutsugeki!! Otome-tachi no Senjou 2

results.deck: Sega's crossover fighting game starring light novel characters from the publisher Dengeki Bunko.
results.name: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax

results.deck: A remake of the 2001 visual novel Family Project, with new artwork and character designs and a reworked and expanded scenario.
results.name: Kazoku Keikaku Re:Tsumugu Ito

results.deck: The official Motocross Grand Prix videogame, covering the 2013 season.
results.name: MXGP

results.deck: The manly men of the 80s manga Sakigake!! Otokojuku return in this 3D fighting game.
results.name: Sakigake!! Otokojuku: Nihon yo, Kore ga Otoko de Aru!

results.deck: A puzzle game where players must guide a group of mice to a piece of cheese; the game is available via PC (through Steam and Gog) and PlayStation platforms.
results.name: MouseCraft

results.deck: Based on the light novel "Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai" (My Little Sister Can't Be This Cute), this PlayStation 3 visual novel expand the base story even further by allowing you, as Kyousuke Kousaka, to be a producer and life consultant for your little sister and her friends, as they becoming an idol.
results.name: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai. HappyenD

results.deck: A Visual Novel by MOENOVEL.
results.name: If My Heart Had Wings

results.deck: A Beenox-developed sequel to the open world web-slinging game. High Voltage Software is developing the 3DS version.
results.name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2

results.deck: Announced at D23 Expo Japan, this is a follow up to Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 Remix. This collection contains Kingdom Hearts II Final Mix, Kingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep Final Mix, and HD cutscenes from Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded.
results.name: Kingdom Hearts HD II.5 Remix

results.deck: One Piece: Unlimited World RED is an action-adventure game based on the manga and anime about wacky pirates.
results.name: One Piece: Unlimited World RED

results.deck: A survival horror game set fifteen years after the original Alien film. It stars Amanda Ripley, the daughter of the film's protagonist, Ellen Ripley.
results.name: Alien: Isolation

results.deck: The latest installment of World Rally Championship.
results.name: WRC 4 FIA World Rally Championship

results.deck: Sony's critically acclaimed Major League Baseball franchise continues into the next generation.
results.name: MLB 14: The Show

results.deck: A new title in the Idolmaster series, where player manages the careers of the 13 idols of 765 Production.
results.name: THE iDOLM@STER: One For All

results.deck: A runner style platformer, created as a companion to legendary anime director Katsuhiro Otomo's anthology movie Short Peace.
results.name: Short Peace: Ranko Tsukigimes Longest Day

results.deck: Visual novel about a young man who lives his life split between several imaginary personalities, trying to escape a trauma from his past.
results.name: Oretachi ni Tsubasa wa Nai - Under the Innocent Sky.

results.deck: An open-world action-adventure game by Monolith, set between the events of The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.
results.name: Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor

results.deck: Phantom Breaker: Extra is an extended edition-cum-sequel of the original Phantom Breaker.
results.name: Phantom Breaker: Extra

results.deck: Deep Silver brings NASCAR to PC, PS3 and Xbox 360 for the 2014 season.
results.name: NASCAR 14

results.deck: The Fourth Shinobi World War continues in the fifth installment of the Ultimate Ninja Storm series.
results.name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution

results.deck: The 2014 edition of Tecmo Koei's horse racing simulator advances the series numbering to 8.
results.name: Winning Post 8

results.deck: LEGO returns to Middle-earth with this video game adaptation of the first two Hobbit movies.
results.name: LEGO The Hobbit

results.deck: Chaos;Child is the fourth major entry in the Science Adventure franchise of visual novels.
results.name: Chaos;Child

results.deck: The fifteenth flagship title in the long running Tales series.
results.name: Tales of Zestiria

results.deck: A new entry in the hostess dating sim.
results.name: Dream C Club Gogo

results.deck: A multiplayer-focused game that features narwhals battling in space.
results.name: Starwhal

results.deck: The first of the two part finale of the Super Robot Wars Z series.
results.name: Dai 3-Ji Super Robot Taisen Z Jigoku-hen

results.deck: Karting game based on the animated series El Chavo del Ocho
results.name: El Chavo Kart

results.deck: Take on the role of a voice over producer and take charge of casting and recording sessions in this Japanese adventure game.
results.name: CV: Casting Voice

results.deck: MMORPG based on Koei's long running Nobunaga's Ambition franchise. Launched in 2003 on the PlayStation 2, it will soon move to it's third generation of Sony hardware when the PlayStation 4 version debuts.
results.name: Nobunaga no Yabou Online

results.deck: The first of two compilations of Muv-Luv side stories.
results.name: Muv-Luv Photonflowers

results.deck: Heartful Simulator Pachi-Slot: To Heart 2 is a pachi-slot game based on To Heart 2.
results.name: Heartful Simulator Pachi-Slot: To Heart 2

results.deck: The 2014 edition of Konami's long-running series of Japanese baseball games.
results.name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2014

results.deck: A new Gundam side story set during the One Year War.
results.name: Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden: Missing Link

results.deck: The Legend of Heroes franchise continues with this direct sequel to Trails of Cold Steel.
results.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel II

results.deck: Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme VS. Full Boost is the sequel to Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme VS. This update includes suits such as Gundam Epyon, Stargazer Gundam, Unicorn Banshee, and more!
results.name: Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme VS. Full Boost

results.deck: WWE 2K15 is the first game in the franchise to appear on the Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC.
results.name: WWE 2K15

results.deck: Basketball returns in NBA 2K15.
results.name: NBA 2K15

results.deck: A modified version of FIFA 14 released to coincide with the 2014 World Cup.
results.name: 2014 FIFA World Cup Brazil

results.deck: The eleventh installment of the Call of Duty franchise (and the first spearheaded by Sledgehammer Games) brings modern military thirty years into the future, as new technology (including powered exoskeleton frames and cloaking devices) makes a certain Private Military Corporation the dominant military force of the world.
results.name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare

results.deck: Bandai Namco adds movie Riders to this Musou-esque sequel.
results.name: Kamen Rider: Battride War II

results.deck: The second visual novel based on the Date A Live franchise, featuring a new original character named Maria Arusu.
results.name: Date A Live: Arusu Install

results.deck: A new Transformers game headed to multiple platforms across home consoles and PC.
results.name: Transformers: Rise of the Dark Spark

results.deck: A 2D fighting game based on Sega's Shining Force games.
results.name: Blade Arcus from Shining

results.deck: The third game in the Risen series, developed by Piranha Bytes.
results.name: Risen 3: Titan Lords

results.deck: A sci-fi role-playing game developed by Gust that ties together the Surge Concerto and Ar Tonelico series.
results.name: Ar Nosurge: Ode to an Unborn Star

results.deck: The 2014 edition of the official MotoGP World Championship video game.
results.name: MotoGP 14

results.deck: 2014 installment in the Cabela's franchise
results.name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter: Pro Hunts

results.deck: Dreamworks Animation's How to Train Your Dragon 2 movie tie-in game developed by Torus Games.
results.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2

results.deck: An officially-licensed handball game featuring over eighty real-world teams.
results.name: IHF Handball Challenge 14

results.deck: A cricket game for PC, Xbox 360, PS3, Xbox One and PS4, bearing the name of the late, legendary Australian batsman Don Bradman.
results.name: Don Bradman Cricket 14

results.deck: The third Borderlands game, set between the events of Borderlands and Borderlands 2, follows a quartet of familiar faces as they work to bring Handsome Jack into power through misadventures on Elpis, the moon of Pandora.
results.name: Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel!

results.deck: Disney Interactive is set to include Marvel characters in the next version of its Disney Infinity series.
results.name: Disney Infinity: Marvel Super Heroes

results.deck: Sci-fi RPG where a team of psychics must enter a mysterious tower to stop "The End", a dangerous terrorist whose attacks threaten to destroy the world.
results.name: Lost Dimension

results.deck: Things go very wrong for young Yuuya when the three beautiful girls in his high school club all turn out to be obsessive stalkers determined to let nothing stop them from keeping him to themselves.
results.name: Harem Tengoku da to Omottara Yandere Jigoku Datta

results.deck: Catering more closely to the core fanbase, Codemasters promises for a more responsive release after listening to fan feedback. This is the next game in the GRID series and descendant of TOCA Touring Cars.
results.name: GRID Autosport

results.deck: Pac, Spiral, and Cylindria continue their spectral escapades in this sequel, as they defend PacWorld from the ghoulish army of Lord Betrayus.
results.name: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures 2

results.deck: Trap the series' villains in physical traps and hold those traps up to your ear to hear the villains struggle in the latest Skylanders release.
results.name: Skylanders Trap Team

results.deck: Nippon Ichi's urban legend themed investigative visual novels return with an all new cast.
results.name: Shin Hayarigami

results.deck: The 26th annual Madden NFL football game.
results.name: Madden NFL 15

results.deck: The 23rd installment in the EA Sports NHL franchise with the promise of a commentary changeover for the first time in eight years, along with revamped physics for both the players and the puck.
results.name: NHL 15

results.deck: An adventure game featuring Sherlock Holmes.
results.name: Sherlock Holmes: Crimes and Punishments

results.deck: A new version of the Monster Hunter MMO spin-off, Fronter G5.
results.name: Monster Hunter Frontier G5

results.deck: An update to the Monster Hunter Frontier G MMO. The G in GG stands for Genuine.
results.name: Monster Hunter Frontier GG

results.deck: A new Adventure Time game
results.name: Adventure Time: The Secret of the Nameless Kingdom

results.deck: Shining Force makes its PlayStation 3 debut.
results.name: Shining Resonance
